data.name: Progleo
data.desc:
2 monsters, except Tokens
During your Main Phase, if you control this Link Summoned card: You can banish this card and 1 of your monsters this card points to, then target 1 Link Monster in either GY; Special Summon it, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Progleo" once per turn.

card_sets.set_name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Link Evolution promotional cards
